name: Daily Mah Jong
description:
Skunk Studios® brings you the hit web game that has entertained people for over six years online into the palm of your hand. The first Mahjongg Solitaire game to bring you daily content now takes relaxation to higher heights. Relax and escape the grind with the beautify and enjoyment of Daily Mah Jong.

☆ Daily Mode keeps you relaxed with three new layouts daily
☆ Reveal you fortune every day to help guide you throughout your days
☆ 600+ levels in Fame Mode to earn a variety of badges
☆ Holiday themes get you excited for those special times o the year.
☆ Share your fortunes with your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter or email
☆ A variety of ranks and badges reward you for seeking inner peace

FEATURES:
☆ Two Modes: Fortune (Daily) and Fame (Level-based)
☆ Over 600 levels custom designed to not strain your eyes on the iPhone or iPod Touch
☆ Over 10 custom designed Mahjongg Solitaire symbol sets plus another 9 Holiday symbol sets
☆ 20 unique tile types that vary from the classic tile to the hamburger or bagel theme.
☆ Over 10 different backgrounds that include beautifully rendered 3D scenes
☆ Best Time and Best Score tracking
